FishingRod_Training_Description: ona li pona tawa kepeken, taso ona li ken alasa e kala lili taso.
FishingRod_AdvancedIridium_Description: ona li alasa e kala. ijo namako tu li ken lon.
Hoe_Description: ona li pona e ma tawa kasi.
MilkPail_Description: ona li poki e telo soweli.
Pan_Description: ona li alasa e kiwen tan telo.
Pan_Copper_Name: ilo alasa telo pi kiwen loje
Pan_Steel_Name: ilo alasa telo pi kiwen walo
Pan_Steel_Description: ona li alasa e kiwen tan telo. alasa li pona mute. ken la ma kiwen ante li ken lon telo.
Pan_Gold_Name: ilo alasa telo pi kiwen jelo
Pan_Gold_Description: ona li alasa e kiwen tan telo. alasa li pona mute mute a. ken la ma kiwen ante li ken lon telo.
Pan_Iridium_Name: ilo alasa telo pi kiwen wawa
Pan_Iridium_Description: ona li alasa e kiwen tan telo. alasa li pona nanpa wan tawa ilo alasa telo ale. ken la ma kiwen ante li ken lon telo.
ReturnScepter_Description: The golden handle quivers with raw potential. Hold this scepter to the sky and return home at will.
ona li wawa a. sina kepeken ona la sina tawa tomo sina lon tenpo lili.
Shears_Description: ona li poki e ko soweli.
TrashCan_Description: When trashing an item, you reclaim {0}% of the value.
sina weka e ijo la, sina kama jo e mani {0}%.
WateringCan_Description: ona li telo e kasi. nanpa wan la o pana e telo tawa ona.
